p: Descriptive statistics were used to present baseline characteristics, including means, standard deviations (SD), medians, and interquartile ranges (IQR). Outcomes were calculated using exact methods to obtain proportions with binomial confidence intervals (CI). As this was a pilot study, we determined sample size based on an a priori interest in feasibility of commitment contracts in approximately 70 adults rather than using power calculations, in preparation for a larger trial of the effectiveness of incentive strategies to promote HIV retesting.
